author: Reuters Editorial
title: Qatar central bank to issue about as much riyal debt in 2018 as in 2017
text:
DUBAI, April 3 (Reuters) - Qatarâ€™s central bank plans to issue roughly the same amount of riyal debt in 2018 as it did in 2017, when it issued 47.5 billion riyals ($13.0 billion), including 18.5 billion riyals of bonds and sukuk, its governor was Quote: d as saying on Tuesday.
Sheikh Abdullah bin Saud al-Thani was speaking in an interview with the Arabic-language Lusail newspaper. (Reporting by Aziz El Yaakoubi; writing by Andrew Torchia; editing by Larry King)
